page.title: 15Trade PO.Stores Droxford
page.content: {Droxford Post Office}is also a newsagent,tobacconist,sells sweets toys stationary etc.Needed for stamps pensions Child benifit car tax giro licences savings etc.About 300 people have newspapers delivered,50 comics 50 magazines.Most popular papers are Mirror on weekdays & Sunday Times. There are 2 full time and 3 part time workers.The{Stores}had its front moved back to make a pavement.This year back of shop has been altered,now sells teas & snacks.Sells groceries hardware etc. and is an Off_Licence.Present owners have lived here for 4\ years 3 people work part time.Some villagers buy all groceries in shop but many use town supermarkets.Bank opens Mon,Thurs Harriott the butcher has a wide custom
